text: Joey Antipas is a Zimbabwean football coach who is manager of Chicken Inn. ==Career== Antipas won the Zimbabwean domestic league with Motor Action in 2010 and Chicken Inn in 2015. In May 2016 he became manager of South African club AmaZulu, but was sacked in August 2017.. He then became the caretaker manager of the Zimbabwe national team in August 2019. On 16 January 2020, Antipas returned to Chicken Inn to become the new manager. https://www.chronicle.co.zw/joey-antipas-returns-to-chicken-inn/ On 30 January 2020, Antipas was named as assistant manager to new Zimbabwean national team manager Zdravko Logarusic.https://www.zimlive.com/2020/01/30/new-zimbabwe- coach-zdravko-logarusic-has-never-kept-a-job-for-2-years/ ==References== Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean football managers Category:Zimbabwe national football team managers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Zimbabwean expatriate football managers Category:Zimbabwean expatriates in South Africa Category:Expatriate soccer managers in South Africa Category:AmaZulu F.C. managers
title: Joey Antipas
